alert.note: Alert for North Clearwater; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:09PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beltrami and east central Clearwater Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Debs, or 20 miles northwest of Bemidji, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinewood around 1210 PM CDT. Debs around 1215 PM CDT. Island Lake in Beltrami County around 1240 PM CDT. Puposky around 1255 PM CDT. Nebish around 100 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
